# Field Technician Monitoring System

## Architecture
Sistema completo de monitoreo de t√©cnicos en campo desplegable en AWS.

## Components
- Backend API (Node.js + Express + PostgreSQL)
- Web Dashboard (React + TypeScript + Mapbox)
- Mobile App (React Native + TypeScript)
- AWS Infrastructure (ECS, RDS, S3, CloudFront)
- CI/CD Pipeline (GitHub Actions + Docker)
